name: The Legend of Kuzu
description:
Kuzu is an Ice-Fire hybrid that needs to find its way in life after hatching from the egg. He will journey through many dangerous miles until he reaches his own dungeon in a quest to become its master. Along the way he will combat deadly monsters, ghosts of the past, and tricky puzzles, using his flying, leaping, ice/fire breath and wits to beat them all.

You need a gamepad to play (xbox gamepad like is better)
